BackstoryDef.title: child experiment
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a baby, [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] parents and experimented on in a lab. One thing [PAWN_possessive] captors did not prepare for was how quickly [PAWN_pronoun] picked up new ideas as [PAWN_pronoun] got older. Eventually, [PAWN_nameDef] escaped the facility after a lot of bloodshed, leaving a pile of bodies in [PAWN_possessive] wake.

BackstoryDef.title: abandoned child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young child, [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents brought [PAWN_objective] to their work place frequently, a bio-lab on a very dangerous planet. One day while [PAWN_pronoun] was wandering the lab, and exacuation was sounded, and [PAWN_pronoun] was left behind by [PAWN_possessive] parents. Whether through dumb luck or pure rage, [PAWN_pronoun] survived the intitial incident that shut down the lab, and was evacuated after one month of surviving alone. [PAWN_possessive] parents never claimed [PAWN_objective], so [PAWN_pronoun] was put into a foster system.

BackstoryDef.title: child genius
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: There was something wrong with [PAWN_nameDef]'s brain from birth. [PAWN_pronoun] was always twitchy, and had an obsession with learning new things that resulted in them becoming alientated by [PAWN_possessive] peers.

BackstoryDef.title: child assassin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised from birth to be the ultimate killing machine. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained to turn everything around [PAWN_objective] into a weapon, including people.

BackstoryDef.title: doomsday bringer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were told that [PAWN_pronoun] would end up destroying the planet. Unwilling to kill or exile [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_possessive] parents kept [PAWN_objective] hidden, giving [PAWN_objective] toys and crafts to play with. Ultimately, the local community heard about [PAWN_objective], and while on the way to escape on a ship, [PAWN_pronoun] accidentally broke key detecting equipment that caused the colony, and ultimately the planet, to be overrun by insects.

BackstoryDef.title: mad scientist's apprentice
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent large amounts of time in [PAWN_possessive] neighbor's lab as an assistant. While there, [PAWN_pronoun] assisted with many unethical experiments, usually on unwilling subjects. When the scientist ended up being arrested, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to start performing [PAWN_possessive] own experiments in secret, experiments that were just as unethical as the ones [PAWN_pronoun] performed as an assistant.

BackstoryDef.title: betrayed fan
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a hero [PAWN_pronoun] adored. [PAWN_pronoun] knew about every heroic deed their hero did, every power they had, and every team [PAWN_possessive] hero was on. One day though, [PAWN_possessive] hero did something that shattered the illusion of greatness, and [PAWN_pronoun] realized that heroes were just people abusing their powers to gain adoring fans. After realizing this, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to play the villain, to do everything [PAWN_pronoun] could to reveal the hypocracy of heroes.
